Name: Honorable Protection
Story Background: In the heart of battle, the knight shielded her allies, embodying the spirit of selflessness and valor.
Ability: Target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. If it's a Knight, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Appearance Description: The art shows a courageous knight standing before her comrades, her shield raised to protect them, with a radiant glow enveloping them all.
